title: 5/19/17 - Bill O'Reilly on the problem at Fox News Channel
description:
A former politician admits his big mistake ...Penn Jillette explains how he got into magic and why he became an atheist ...Bill O'Reilly remembers his former boss Roger Ailes ...Did Ailes save the Reagan presidency? ...How Ailes made Glenn sweat ...How Ailes made enemies in the business ...Bill O'Reilly: 'Fox news has a problem...it doesn't look like they have a plan ...Bill O'Reilly details President Trump's biggest mistake and where he should go from here...Why Japan is over as a nation ...Young women, older men and the dating scene in Japan 

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
